title: Thermos应该用luckperms的哪个版本
author: 肆火
txt_content:
如题
luckperms原版不支持thermos 
用了LuckPermsLegacy也不行qwq
希望有大大能解决或者推荐一个可以支持mysql的权限插件(不要pex)

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Installation
Navigate to the libraries/net/md-5/SpecialSource/1.7-SNAPSHOT directory
Delete the SpecialSource-1.7-SNAPSHOT.jar file
Download SpecialSource v1.7.4 from https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/n ... ialSource-1.7.4.jar
Copy the jar file to the libraries/net/md-5/SpecialSource/1.7-SNAPSHOT directory
Rename the jar file you just copied to SpecialSource-1.7-SNAPSHOT.jar
Start up server. If it stops immediately, you have renamed the SpecialSource wrong.
打开libraries/net/md-5/SpecialSource/1.7-SNAPSHOT 目录
删除SpecialSource-1.7-SNAPSHOT.jar
下载https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/n ... ialSource-1.7.4.jar
复制到libraries/net/md-5/SpecialSource/1.7-SNAPSHOT
改名为SpecialSource-1.7-SNAPSHOT.jar
